page.title: 11GAMES PEOPLE PLAY
page.content: Games are fun,most games are a bit tiring.There are many different games, some played indoors,some outside;some are best played on grass others can be played on a hard surface.In some games people can get hurt like rugby,football and hockey.In most games outside you use a ball.In netball you have to throw a big,light ball through a hoop stuck to a pole in the air.In hockey you hit a small ball through two posts called goalposts with a banana shaped stick.In rounders you try to hit a small ball which somebody throws at you,with a thin round bat as far as you can and then you run round four posts to score a point.You can be out if someone catches the ball before it hits the ground or if the ball is thrown to a post and gets there before you do.We play all these games at school as well as "stuck in the mud","british bulldog"
